item.description:
WHAT: International Deaf Club of Massachusetts (IDCM) hosts its Fall Social.
WHEN: Sat., Nov. 20th from 2 - 6 p.m.
WHERE: Big City Pub, Allston, MA.

THE DETAILS:
Come join us for a great time of conversations, games, eats and drinks. Admission is free but you will be responsible for your food and drink at the pub. The social will take place on the 2nd floor near the pool tables (with elevator access for those of you who need a lift). So grab your friends and come on down! The IDCM committee hope to see you there! :D

IDCM Facebook PAGE:
http://www.facebook.c...

BIG CITY WEB SITE:
http://www.allstonsfi...

HOW:
CAR: Parking available behind Blanchard's Liquor store (2 hour limit)
MBTA: Green Line "B" or bus line for the Brighton Ave. stops.
item.name: The IDCM Fall Social
